resources.string: University of Illinois at Chicago | Graduating in May 2019 | GPA 3.71
Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani | Graduated in Jun 2014 | GPA 5.76/10

Create a proof of concept solution to automate testing of BMW connected mobile application and BMW connected in-car navigation application. The solution should seamless test both the systems using the same hardware
Designed and developed native Android and cross-platform applications for multiple clients. Worked with various Google APIs, Restful Apis, services etc.
